comments:
200308281813

1. Debug a runtime workbench
2. Cause it to hang (don't know how)
3. Try to pause one thread of the debugged process
-> eclipse (the main one) hangs, with a TimeoutException every other second (see
log below). It returned after a couple of minutes, showing dozens of threads in
the thread view, all saying "does not respond" or so.

-> I switched perspectives to Java and back to Debug, resulting in a similar
cycle starting.
-> Control came back immediately when I killed the debugged process.

Stack traces look like:

The (outer) eclipse "hangs" as the launch view is updated in the UI thread 
(i.e. retrieveing labels for threads/frames which each cause a timeout 
exception). Our plan is to update the lables in a background job to avoid 
such "blocking".

This actually the same problem as bug 16036

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16036 ***
